Texts.Eng:
Once invaded by an alien force which forced them to focus on their military and their defenses, they're extraordinary well trained fighters. Their aquatic origins make them especially dangerous in water and make them a force to be reckoned with.
 
  Diet: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;: 
  Energy x^green;1.2^reset;, +^green;2500^reset; Breath
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Ice, +^green;20^reset;% Poison, +^green;10^reset;% Physical
  ^cyan;Swim Boost 2^reset;
 
^orange;Environment^reset;: 
  Ocean biomes: Health x^green;1.25^reset; and +^green;6^reset; Defense
  Hot biomes: Energy x^red;0.7^reset;
  (Healing/Waste/Swamp) Water: +^green;0.5^reset;% Health Regen, Health x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;6^reset; Defense.
  

^orange;Weapons^reset;: 
  Energy: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance, Damage x^green;1.15^reset;
  Assault Rifle: +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance
 
^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;10^reset;% Fire, Radioactive, Shadow , -^red;30^reset;% Electric Resist
